transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
Hanji baat karwa ji.
Hanji.
Senior se baat karwaiye aap apne senior se baat karwaiye. 
Sir abhi wo aapko call back kar lenge bol to diya aapne sir aap khud hi bar bar phone kar rahe hain fir bolenge ki main mere pass kya karenge fir hath se hath rakh ke baithe rahenge hum aapka intezar karenge. 
Aapka to payment ka time hoga usi samay hath faila doge fir. 
Payment to teen teen account kar rahe hain. 
Hath faila denge ye ye sab bol. 
Aur kya hai to yahi yahi hai aur kya hai. 
Sir aise baat karenge. 
Aap majbur kar dete ho hume bolne ke liye. 
Main baat nahi kar paunga sorry sir.
Baat karo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Request to speak with a senior.

- Expressed frustration about waiting and payment issues.

- Accusation of extending hands during payment time.



Resolution:

- Assurance of a call back from a senior.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved.



Alert (If Any):

- Payment

- Account

- Hath faila denge



@@@Sentiment:

Angry, Frustrated.



@@@Key Topics:

senior, callback, payment, account
